location: Fuxing South Road Section 1, 127m from Zhongxiao Fuxing MRT Station (Bannan/Wenhu lines)
notes: Recently renovated (within 6 months) independent studio with upscale finishes, fully furnished including washer, AC, and balcony. Excellent location near MRT. For a couple expecting a baby, the 13.43 ping (~44 sqm) studio may feel cramped; check balcony railing safety. No pets policy and studio layout may not be ideal for a growing family.
